attributes.action: ORDER THE BBC TO REFUND ALL LICENCES TAXES PAID BY THOSE WHO SUPPORT THE YES CAMPAIGN.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is stated in upper case letters above.  So often you seem unable to identify what it is we want you to do.  It is hoped this will be helpful to you.

The BBC has announced that it plans to interfere in the political movement to support a No vote in the Scottish Referendum.  I do NOT support a no vote and do not wish to fund any organisation which acts in favour of a no vote.  The BBC is a media organisation and it is NOT a political party and to use licence taxpayers fees for political motives MUST a the very least be illegal.  If the BBC wishes to dabble in politics then it should refund EVERY SINGLE LICENCE TAXPAYER WHO DOES NOT SUPPORT A NO CAMPAIGN IN THE SCOTTISH REFERENDUM.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC Trust.
